page.title: 12An Ordinary Day (Cont.)
page.content:
the house of their tutor who lives in same road as us.Its very convenient _most of the chrildrens other extra-curriculcer actiuities take place at least ten miles outside the village in one or the other nearby towns.Between them, the children belong to two swimming clubs, the local cub pack ,and go to judo , trampoline and music and dance classes.They also have a swimming lesson on Saturday mornings ,so most of the week is taken up ferrying one or other of them about in my ten year Ford Cortina car.It was a heap of rust a few weeks ago,but having just had it re-sprayed I am now quite proud of its new gleaming gold coat.
The children go to school at 8.45 am via the crossing lady who stands just outside our house.{
